name: Finn's Flowers
description:
Collect all 5 flowers to plant your garden.

Arrows or WASD to move, space to jump. Up/W goes through doors or grabs/releases ropes.

This was kind of a learning/practice project, so it has some janky bits and potentially infuriating level design, etc.

Tileset extended from Trixie's Stringstar Fields, player character modified/animated from Egor Dorichev's Chare (CC0).

The main music is UncleBibby's CopperNickle (CC-by 4.0), and the music in the forest level is Komiku's Mushrooms (CC0).
